answers.answer: I'm right there with ya. I got pregnant when my son was 3 months old the due dates are 2 days apart from measurement of baby and if you go by period date this baby girl is due 9 days before my sons due date... Lol

Lol glad I'm not alone. My first one came 10 days early and her original due date was July 30th. According to this app because I have been to the doctors yet this one is due august 12th so they not too far behind and since I experienced preeclampsia with my first I'm sure this one will be here sooner than the due date as well. I hope I survive lol
Yeah my son was born April 28th due to Gestational hypertension getting worse and worse so he was 2 1/2 weeks early. And I'm already having problems with bp so :-(
Im back too. Im using the same name i used when pregant with my daughter. Got pregnant when she was 10 months . Now 16 weeks pregnant .

Don't get me wrong...I'm more than happy to be having a baby but he wasn't planned and I'm terrified of getting pregnant again after he's born so I honestly don't think my boyfriend and I will be in any hurry to be intimate...ya'll are brave! Lol! And please don't take offense to that...having kids is great I just really don't want another one until I decide I'm ready
I hear ya . Mine wasnt planned either . And we were both taking care of each other so i wouldnt get pregnant . We couldnt believe . Now it sunk in and we are happy !
not alone baby girl turns 6months in a few days and here i am almost 12wks pregnant and not plan at all either.

Mine wasn't planned really we decided after 11 years of trying we didn't want on birth control pills because we wanted more kids but since it took 11 years to have 2 kids we didn't think it would happen for a while. But O so happy we are getting our first girl :-D

question: I can't believe I am back. This time in a different age group, but I just found out I was pregnant this pass Wednesday. I have a almost 5 month old daughter. How the hell did this happen lol.
title: Another baby
